description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Main Features: Main duties and responsibilities: The Help Desk technician / I.T coordinator assistant provide technical support and systems supervisor when possible:
              

              •	Technical support calls received from Admin & IT Department.
              
              •	Technical support to address the issues and provide appropriate solution.
              
              •	Troubleshoot and resolve end-user hardware, operating system, and software related problems. Work on troubleshooting and resolving ransomware attacks.
              
              •	Troubleshoot and resolve network and server access problems for end users.
              
              •	Troubleshoot and resolve issues with WAN, VLAN, firewall, VPN, systems.
              
              •	Troubleshoot and resolve issues with voice communications (i.e. telephone) and voice mail systems.
              
              •	Prepare reports, file, and provide general assistance to Admin and Personnel Department Manager in relation to I.T.
              
              •	Participation in the I.T. Extended Support Program.
              

              * Activities:
              
              •	Provide installation, configuration work for local work stations (Desktops, Laptop, etc.) including new hardware and software installation, upgrades to workstation hardware/software and general user assistance with various work stations software.
              
              •	Troubleshoots technical problems for end users/ customers who use Company's IT service.
              
              •	Review servers’ disk space utilization and perform proactive disk space management.
              
              •	Perform monitoring of FACSYS server and perform regularly faxes archive.
              
              •	Review requirements from business and propose solution.
              
              •	Estimate the development effort for the requirements to develop local automations.
              
              •	Perform procurement of IT equipment, monitor IT inventory.
              
              •	Updating applications and operating system on all PCs using SMS servers.
              
              •	Maintaining VPN networks in remote. Monitoring network traffic and avoid traffic congestion by adjusting Packet Shaper, network accelerator (using proxy devices Expand Network Accelerator).
              
              •	Maintaining F&P server and Accounting Server to ensure systems accessibility
              
              •	Identify opportunities to enable process improvements or new efficient business models by using Information
              
              •	Perform other related duties as assigned or requested.
              
              •	Ability to work 24x7 on-call workweek.
              
              •	Perform proactive maintenance of IT facilities.

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              *	Bachelor of Computer Science, University of Information Technology
              

              •	Proficiency in using and understanding basic of computer technology in a business environment.
              
              •	Effective computer skills; Microsoft Office Software, and other.
              
              •	Company and discipline specific software applications. Master with systems or applications e.g.  Citrix ,FAST/SAP Riege/Ottelle and all other possible coming application.
              
              •	Effective communication skills both verbally and in writing with superiors, colleagues, and individuals inside and outside the Company.
              
              •	Effective analytical and problem-solving skills.
              
              •	Good at Math and interest in working with numbers
              
              •	Straightforward and enthusiasm
              
              •	Team work and excellent communication and presentation
              
              •	Self-control under pressure and high responsibility in working
